snakeai.game.model module¶

Snake¶

class snakeai.game.model.Snake(dim)¶

Bases: object

A class which stores the info about the game

Parameters

dim (int) – The side of the board

Variables

  • dim (int) – the side of the board

  • MAX_SCORE (int) – The maximum score achievable

  • MAX_GROWING (int) – The maximum length of the snake

  • score (int) – The current score

  • direction (Actions) – The current direction

  • isGameOver (Bool) – whether the snake has reached game over

changeDirection(direction)¶

Change the direction of the snake. Ignore it if it is opposite to current direction

Parameters

direction (Actions) – the new direction of the snake

reset()¶

Prepare to start the game

setApple()¶

Choose new valid position for the apple

property snake¶

The body of the nake (head is last)

Type

list of Coords

property state¶

A description of the current state

Type

FrozenState

step()¶

Update model by moving snake of one step

Returns

The reward obtained after the step

Return type

Rewards
